match

Class Controller<T extends Robot>

  • java.lang.Object
    • match.Controller<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - generalization of Robot
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutomatedController

    public class Controller<T extends Robot>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used to manage Robot choices
    Author:
    Mattia Rosselli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
